title: I Turned Into A Zombie: A Zombie Diary for Early Readers
description: My name is Wil. On my eleventh birthday, I turned into a zombie. One moment, I was enjoying video games. The next my skin was turning green. I even wanted to eat brains! There's only one thing that can save me. Junk food. Lots of junk food. You can read about the strange, gross and funny things that happened to me and my friends in my diary.  I Turned Into a Zombie is a fun, engaging chapter book for kids that love stories where weird things happen.  There's plenty of laughs and a theme of friendship that parents and kids alike will all love. Perfect for readers who are transitioning into chapter books, or for families who love to read together, I turned Into a Zombie is a fast-paced and entertaining read that will have you looking for a sequel as soon as you're done.
author: Wil Zombie
